item.description:
This looks like an exciting and challenging show.

From the website:

The MIT List Visual Arts Center and the Contemporary Arts Museum, Houston, present the first museum survey of the work of media art pioneer Stan VanDerBeek, exploring his investigation of art, technology, and communication. Surveying the artist’s remarkable body of work in collage, experimental film, performance, participatory and computer-generated art over several decades, "Stan VanDerBeek: The Culture Intercom" highlights the artist’s pivotal contribution to today’s media-based artistic practices.

http://listart.mit.edu/node/660

We'll meet in the lobby of the MIT List Visual Arts Center at 1:00pm. Afterward, anyone interested can meet for a bite and chat about life as collage, “expanded cinema,” “newsreels of dreams,” and/or the weather.

Location info for the List Center: http://listart.mit.edu/about
item.how_to_find_us: First floor lobby of the List Center
item.name: Stan VanDerBeek at MIT List Center
